text: Kylie Jenner and Khloe Kardashian continue to be hella cryptic about their rumored pregnancies. The sisters linked up to make a YouTube video showing off their Kylie Cosmetics collaboration lip colors called the KoKo Kollection. So obviously, between freaking out over how they're totally twinning with their matching blonde hair and mooning over how amazing the colors look on each other, they slipped in some cryptic jokes about babies. ` ` Every color looks amazing on you,'' Kylie told Khloe, the collection's namesake, after trying out all the colors. ` ` We created them,'' Khloe responded. ` ` It ’ s our baby together, we have eight! ” Apparently not caring that this joke would send Kylie and JKhlie fans into
